text:
https://twitter.com/_wald0/status/1751007212724793568

Re: Midnight Blizzard breach of Microsoft, this bears repeating: The
AppRoleAssignment.ReadWrite.All MS Graph app role BYPASSES the consent process.
This is BY DESIGN. This app role is EXTRAORDINARILY dangerous. Read more in
@sahilmalik

's blog post: 
https://winsmarts.com/how-to-grant-admin-consent-to-an-api-programmatically-e32f4a100e9d
 
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.co%2FhiDR57QUzR&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C724ab158a8724dff4c7708dc1f1816ee%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638419435536300396%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=8deNystrhiAkyW4Dez1%2BI%2BJudL7i8ho%2BVaLWS2AaxEM%3D&reserved=0
%4015784bd3.com

Re: Midnight Blizzard breach of Microsoft, this bears repeating: The
AppRoleAssignment.ReadWrite.All MS Graph app role BYPASSES the consent process.
This is BY DESIGN. This app role is EXTRAORDINARILY dangerous. Read more in
@sahilmalik
